programme.desc: Treasure - Morris and Pearl have lost one of their medals in the canal. Stanley fishes it out only have the complete collection dropped in. Stanley dons a diver's suit and goes after them.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Library Book - Stanley must track down the missing library book, 'The Little Book of New Things to Do'. He visits various townsfolk who have leant the book to each other.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Runaway Train - Stanley must deliver some parcels on the train but ends up delivering the wrong ones. After correcting his mistake, he has to muster the townsfolk to help stop his runaway train.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Knitting - Stanley must teach his friends how to knit. They all knit so much they burst out the top of the community centre. Stanley repairs the roof with the groups knitting.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Recital - Myrtle wants everyone to see her new dance so enlists Stanley to gather some friends. However, the stereo breaks so they have to make their own music.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Flight - Cynthia asks Stanley to teach her to fly an aeroplane for Fifi's birthday. Stanley constructs a flight simulator and has the help of their friends to put her through her paces.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Shop - Stanley covers Jose at the shop and ends up making too much popcorn. So as not to waste it all, Stanley and his friends put on a film night to screen Little Woo's film.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Farm - Amare asks Stanley to help her on the farm. Stanley asks Little Woo, Fred and Fifi to join him in sowing seeds, watering plants and picking apples, all whilst having fun.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Dig - Stanley helps Fifi and Fred dig up some shiny stones in their garden that turn out to be old bits of mosaic. With the help of Cynthia and Hettie, they put the pieces back together.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Holiday - Seamus has booked the wrong date for his and Little Woo's holiday. Stanley repurposes the locations of the town into activities and sights to give them a holiday in a day.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Sofa - Stanley has to fix Myrtles wobbly sofa so her and her friends can watch Fred and Fifi on the Boogie Woogie Dance Show together. He ends up creating a super-duper special sofa.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Pea Soup - Monty thinks Gran's soup might be the tastiest ever, but he wonders how you can know if something is the best in the world.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep32
programme.desc: It's Time for Pottery - Jared has a special plant which needs a pot, so JoJo makes him one in a pottery class. When the pot is knocked onto the floor and breaks, Gran Gran has a plan.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep31
programme.desc: It's Time to Play in the Snow - JoJo, Gran Gran, Ezra and Jaxon are all set for a day of sledging in the snow, but when the sledge breaks, Gran Gran comes up with a plan so that they all can keep having fun in the snow!

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Cloud Tower - A search for shade on a hot day leads Sarah and Duck to discover a fascinating tower.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Sound Jumble - When Sarah hears some interesting music on the radio, she and Duck try to recreate it.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep7
programme.desc: Nia and the Unfriendly Elephant - Nia is excited about being asked to transport a new elephant to the animal park, but the animal is scared of steam trains.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep44
programme.desc: Mount Mumandad - Bingo and Bluey have five minutes to bed, just enough time to race to the summit of Mount Mumandad. But for them, facing powerful storms, avalanches and stinky spots will take teamwork.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep45
programme.desc: Kids - A quick trip to the shops proves tricky for Dad, when Bingo and Bluey want to play a game of 'Kids'. Now Bluey is Mum, Bingo's her baby and for Dad however, he is a very naughty boy.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep46
programme.desc: Chickenrat - It's bedtime and Bingo can't remember where she left her beloved Floppy. Retracing their steps, Bingo and Bluey lead their Mum through their bizarre day in the hope of tracking her down.

programme.title: Supertato S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Super Sandcastle - Supertato and the Veggies have built a super sandcastle, but Evil Pea wants to storm it by firing her hordes of Mini Peas at it with her pea shooter.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep20
programme.desc: The Yoga Badge - Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep21
programme.desc: The Collecting Badge - Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep22
programme.desc: The Shadow Badge - Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep45
programme.desc: Endangered Species, So Paulo, Brazil - The Go Jetters are upset after hearing of the species that need help. Ubercorn tries to cheer them up by planning a visit to the forests of Sao Paulo.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep46
programme.desc: Mission Manatee, USA - The Go Jetters are in the Gulf of Mexico to learn about Manatees, peaceful water mammals that spend most of their time either sleeping or eating sea-grass.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep47
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Symbiosis Shrink Down - The Go Jetters learn about 'symbiosis' - when two different animals or plants help each other.

programme.title: My World Kitchen S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Sienna's Nigerian Jollof Rice - Sienna is cooking Nigerian Jollof Rice. Sienna's dad has prepared a colourful Nigerian salad to eat with the rice and they have treated their guests to some Nigerian 'chin chin' too.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures S1 Ep29
programme.desc: Andy and the Long Tailed Macaques - Andy, Jen and Scout jet off in the Explorer and head to Thailand on a global adventure in search of long-tailed macaques. The team discover macaques have an appetite for shellfish.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep18
programme.desc: Proper Pirate Proficiency Test - Captain Captain is wearing her Proper Pirate Proficiency badge and Seaweed realises he doesn't have one! He discovers he will have to pass the Proper Pirate Proficiency Test or he'll have to leave.

programme.title: Panda and Krash S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Runaway Train - Krash discovers an abandoned toy train carriage in the corner of the room.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep45
programme.desc: Road Trip - Mum helps Bluey and Bingo find ways to entertain themselves on a family road trip, while Dad tries to stay ahead of the grey nomad convoy or risk camping near the toilets.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep46
programme.desc: Ice Cream - Bluey and Bingo want a lick of each other's ice cream. But they are so focused on making sure each lick is fair, they don't notice their ice creams are melting.

programme.desc: Dunny - Mum bans the girls from saying the word 'dunny' because it's not a word the Queen of England would use, but the kids try and trick her into saying it anyway.

programme.title: Supertato S2 Ep7

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Time And Tide
programme.desc: Time and Tide transcends time to detail extraordinary historical events in Japan and the world. Join NHK WORLD-JAPAN on a journey that reveals the truth behind some of the turning points of the past.

programme.title: Cinematic Journey
programme.desc: Join our explorers as they pursue the cinematic beauty of Japan. Kyle Card hikes the newly designated long trail around majestic Mt. Fuji and discovers its secrets.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: The head Inari shrine has 30,000 subordinate shrines throughout Japan. Since its foundation in 711, the Inari deities attract worshippers with varying needs.

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.title: Jomon 10,000 Years Of Wisdom
programme.desc: The Jomon period began around 15,000 years ago and lasted 10,000 years. The people were hunter-gatherers, but they settled in one place and enjoyed a rich culture.

programme.title: UFC 319: Du Plessis vs. Chimaev
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC returns to United Center in the Windy City of Chicago on August 17 with a stacked UFC 319 event featuring one of the most highly anticipated middleweight title fights in years. South Africas Dricus Du Plessis has taken UFC by storm since arriving in the Octagon in 2020, and after winning the UFC middleweight crown against Sean Strickland, hes continued to dominate with wins over Israel Adesanya and Strickland in their February rematch. But many believe his toughest test to date will be unbeaten challenger Khamzat Chimaev, whose list of UFC victories includes the names of Robert Whittaker, Kamaru Usman and Gilbert Burns

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Walker vs. Zhang
programme.desc: Prelims - When the UFC makes its second trip to Shanghai on August 23rd, one of Chinas top young stars will lead the way as The Mountain Tiger, Zhang Mingyang, faces off with Brazils Johnny Walker in the main event of UFC Fight Night. Currently sporting a 12-fight winning streak that includes first-round knockouts of Brendson Ribeiro, Ozzy Diaz and Anthony Smith, the 27-year-old Zhang is a finisher of the highest order, and he expects to add another victory to his ledger when he takes on Walker, a veteran light heavyweight contender who also has the ability to end a fight with a single strike
